name: Bishop Bouldering Select
description: Explore some of the best bouldering in the world. This guide to Bishop, California covers over 600 of the area's best problems in Rock Creek, the Happy and Sad boulders, Druid Stones, and both road-side and backcountry areas in the famous Buttermilk Country. Everything you need is here, from inspirational full colour photos to amenity information, helpful maps, and a tick list.
